title: How to Share Audible Books with a Friend or Family Member

steps.title: Set up an Amazon Family household.
steps.content: Set up an Amazon Family household. If you have Amazon Prime, you can share any Audible book you own with members of your household. Books you own can be shared with one other adult family member and up to four children. [1] X Research source If you haven't set up a Household yet, you'll want to do that first. Go to the Amazon Family website. Click Add Adult . Or, if the person you're adding is 12 or under, select Add Child . [2] X Research source If adding an adult, enter their email address to send them an invitation. Once they accept, they'll be added to your household. If adding a child, fill out their profile and click Save to add them. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Go to the Manage Your Content and Devices page.
steps.content: Go to the Manage Your Content and Devices page. Go to Manage Your Content and Devices in any web browser. If you are sharing an Audible book with a child, go to the Amazon Parent Dashboard instead, then select the child you want to share with.

steps.title: Click the Content tab.
steps.content: Click the Content tab. It's near the top of the page.

steps.title: Click Audiobooks.
steps.content: Click Audiobooks . A list of Audible books you own will appear.

steps.title: Select the book you want to share.
steps.content: Select the book you want to share. Some options will appear.

steps.title: Click Add to Library.
steps.content: Click Add to Library . This adds the Audible book to your family library. Now that you've added it, your family members will also see it when they sign in to the Audible app on their mobile devices and Kindle ereaders. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Sign in to the Audible Gift Center.
steps.content: Sign in to the Audible Gift Center. If you want to share an Audible book with someone who isn't a member of your Amazon family, you can buy it as a gift. In any web browser on any device, go to the Audible Gift Center .

steps.title: Search for the audiobook you want to share.
steps.content: Search for the audiobook you want to share. Under "Gift a specific title," search for the book you want to send. Its price will appear beneath the title.

steps.title: Click Give as a gift.
steps.content: Click Give as a gift . This opens a form you'll need to complete.

steps.title: Fill out the form and click Continue.
steps.content: Fill out the form and click Continue . Enter the email address of the person you want to share the book with and complete the rest of the form. If you'd rather print out a link to the book to hand someone in person, you can toggle on the Print option.

steps.title: Click the Buy button to make your purchase.
steps.content: Click the Buy button to make your purchase. The book's price will appear next to the "Buy" button. From here, just fill out your billing information to complete the purchase, and a link to the gifted audiobook will be sent to the recipient. [5] X Research source

steps.title: Open the Audible app on your Android, iPhone, or iPad.
steps.content: Open the Audible app on your Android, iPhone, or iPad. You can use the Audible mobile app to share a link to an Audible book you think they'll enjoy. Your friend will need to have their own Audible membership or use credits to listen to it–this will not actually give the person free access to read the book. The only way you can share the full book itself is to use Amazon Family or buy it for them as a gift . Start by launching the app.

steps.title: Tap Library.
steps.content: Tap Library . A list of Audible books in your library will appear.

steps.title: Tap the three-dot menu next to the book you want to share.
steps.content: Tap the three-dot menu next to the book you want to share. A menu will expand.

steps.title: Tap Share.
steps.content: Tap Share . This opens your share screen, where you can select an app to share the Audible book with.

steps.title: Select an app to send a sharing link.
steps.content: Select an app to send a sharing link. You can choose how you want to send the book. You can send the book via email, Facebook Messenger, text message, or any other compatible form of sharing.

steps.title: Enter the recipient information and tap Send.
steps.content: Enter the recipient information and tap Send . Your friend will receive a link to the Audible book you're recommending. If they follow the link, they can check out its description and choose whether to read it.

steps.title: Go to https://audible.com and log in.
steps.content: Go to https://audible.com and log in. If you want to share a link to an audiobook with a friend who might be interested, you can do so through the Audible website. This will not give your friend free access to the book, however–it's just a link so they can check it out and see if they want to buy it with their own credits .

steps.title: Click the Library tab.
steps.content: Click the Library tab. You'll see this near the top of the page.

steps.title: Click the three dots next to the book you want to share.
steps.content: Click the three dots next to the book you want to share. A menu will expand.

steps.title: Click Share to share the book.
steps.content: Click Share to share the book. Follow the on-screen instructions to share a link to the Audible book with whoever you want to share it with.

steps.title: Can you lend someone an Audible book?
steps.content: Can you lend someone an Audible book? No, there is no way to lend an Audible book. Your Audiobooks are connected to your own library and cannot be lent to others.

steps.title: Is Audible free with Amazon Prime?
steps.content: Is Audible free with Amazon Prime? Audible does not come as a free perk with your Amazon Prime subscription. To use Audible, you'll need to subscribe to a Plus or Premium Plus plan. [6] X Research source

steps.title: Can I transfer an Audible book to another Audible account?
steps.content: Can I transfer an Audible book to another Audible account? It's not possible to transfer an Audible book from one Audible account to another. The book will stay connected to the account on which you bought it.

steps.title: Can I return an Audible book?
steps.content: Can I return an Audible book? If you bought a book by accident or have changed your mind, you can return an audiobook within 365 days of purchase. You must have an Audible Premium Plus account that's in good standing to process a return. [7] X Research source
